alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 11:59AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts 65 to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin
